text: Kim Hyuk-kyu (; born October 23, 1996), better known as Deft (), is a South Korean professional League of Legends player. He is an AD Carry player who currently plays for DragonX. In 2018, he has been selected as one of the torch relay runners for 2018 PyeongChang Winter Olympics, alongside with his fellow kt Rolster members. Deft is the seventh player to reach 1,000 kills in the LPL on August 26, 2016. He is the ninth player to reach 1,000 kills in the LCK. He achieved his 1,000 kills on March 21, 2019. His 1,000th kill was on kt Rolster Kingen's Aatrox with his Ezreal. He is the first and only player to have reached 1,000 kills in two different regions. Throughout his professional career, he has won a total of $364,747.46 of prize money from 40 tournaments. == Early life == Deft was born in Seoul on October 23, 1996. He attended the same high school with Faker from T1. He used to play Sudden Attack before going professional. He is a fan of Tottenham Hotspur F.C. and a fan of Son Heung-min.
